SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.bitwise.decaf.editor
Class Utils

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.bitwise.decaf.editor.Utils
public class Utils
extends Object

This static class provides facilities for a number of common Decaf operations that are distinct from an instance of any particular thing, or that cannot be attached to the appropriate source (Type methods, for instance, cannot be included in the interface Type, by language rule). Also included are some specializations of common JDK constructs, which are declared as public members of this class to prevent package sprawl.

Nested Class Summary
static class Utils.CollectionMap
          CollectionMap stores key-collection pairs, and allows a single value to be added to a collection by key reference.
static class Utils.EmptyVector
          The EmptyVector rejects all attempts to add elements to it, such that a single instance of it may be used universally as a "no thanks" reponse from implementations of abstract and interface methods requiring a return value of collection.
static class Utils.List
          List maintains an ordered set (rejecting duplicate additions on the basis of equals()), and notifies Utils.List.Listeners when its contents change.
static class Utils.ListModel
          A ListModel based on a List, which may be applied to the model at any time.
static class Utils.Location
          A diagonally incrementable Dimension.
static class Utils.RealEstateManager
          Facilitates the placement of windows on the desktop.
static interface Utils.Renderable
          Implemented by visible components.
static class Utils.RenderLabel
          A JLabel customized for use in a RenderPanel; defaults to opaque with white background.
static class Utils.RenderPanel
          Adds some convenience to JPanel, and sets all contained components to be transparent, such that the background color of the RenderPanel always shows through.
static class Utils.SerialException
          Reports an attempt to serialize an instance of a class that has been determined to be non-serializable (by policy or by definition)
static class Utils.SerialVector
          A Vector that attempts to weed out non-serializable components before going to disk.

noType

public static Type.NoType noType
Placeholder for Type instances prior to the user's application of any particular type. I've chosen not to implement a default for this situation because it would cause problems with type-based rules.

deepCopy

public static Collection deepCopy(Collection c)
